reviews.review: JUEGO TAN EXAGERADAMENTE ABURRIDO QUE PENSE QUE ESTABA DURMIENDO A LA MITAD, HASTA EL LIFE IS STRANGE TIENE UNA JUGABILIDAD MAS ENTRETENIDA, GRAFICOS DE MIERDA SE QUEDAN MUY ATRAS EN COMPARACION A LOS JUEGOS SALIDOS EN 2020
2021年的我玩这个游戏仍然觉得非常的惊艳，连夜用了13小时通关了这个游戏，非常推荐巨好玩。
Jogão, com certeza um dos melhores que já joguei. Recomendo demais
This is one of the best games you can play 10/10.

It's 2021, and Half-Life 2 still has one of the best menus I've ever seen. It's not so much the UI as it is the live background and activity going on. It just looks awesome and is the only menu I really stop to watch and enjoy for a bit before progressing onward. 

#MenuReviews

This game established almost every single first person sim/shooter technique from this point on. It is THE classic, though slightly dated.

You owe it to yourself to force your way through Half-Life 2, it is both inspiring and entertaining to this day.

Не игра, а легенда тех времён! Захватывающий сюжет, не плохая физика и проработка деталей, графика не из лучших но тоже хороша, единственное что хочу отметить из минусов это баги - в моих скриншотах из халфы можно увидеть что вместо глаз феолетовый и чёрный цвет в клетку. Ну а так всем рекомендую эту игру!
Grafik und Story top zur seiner Zeit !!!!

Это черт возьми, легендарная Half-Life 2! Великолепное продолжение игры о докторе Фримене, обладателе не менее легендарного инструмента (монтировки). Да, в этой игре было множество нового оружия (гравипушка) транспорта, и новый, интересный сюжет, повествующий о тоталитарном государстве (множество отсылок к СССР, включая архитектуру и множество тематических деталей доставляют!).
Так же оптимизация игры, графика (Это был 2004 год, к слову) шикарны для своего времени! Проснитесь и пойте, Мистер Фримен!
Однако, эта игра лично мне не зашла ввиду гнетущей тоталитарной атмосферы. Меня хватило на полтора с лишним часа. К сожалению. Однако, спешу заметить, мое мнение субъективно. 10 хэдкрабов из 10!
Love how the story goes, and it's very fun.
keep recommending friends to play this game
it is the best game ever

Merhabalar!
Şuan incelemeyi okuyan kardeşim, lütfen okuma ve direkt oyunu al. Böyle bir oyunu oynamamak ne büyük acizlik, oynamaksa ne büyük bir yüceliktir. "Valve" kardeşim sana sesleniyorum lütfen şu oyunun üçüncü serisini çıkartın.
good game but why cliffhanger ending?

This physics based wonder is a great squeal to the 1998 original, and it's expansions. it's story isn't anything to special, but it keeps the great gameplay, and with some new stuff added by the, at the time brand new Source Engine. it's combat has it's faults, mostly with the hit scanning combine, but overall this game lives up to the original FPS masterpiece.

非常经典的游戏，主要是剧情设计的非常好，以前买的盗版玩到有些地方就没有了，为了弥补以前的遗憾，专门买来玩一玩。
Bardzo dobry Half-Life, nie ma już tych rybek przerażających z jedynki więc nie ma obaw można nurkować bezpiecznie, lokacje jak na Valve dobrze zaprojektowane i ciekawe, można grać

shows its age, great way to learn ur history
Um dos meus games favorito, ou o favorito, Half Life 2 é um jogo único, revolucionário, com uma ótima trilha sonora e com personagens marcantes. De fato, um jogo perfeito!
Пожалуй лучшая игра за всё время, пожалуй лучшая физика в играх после Control. И еще миллионы таких "пожалуй". Рекомендую к прохождению.
Realmente um jogo muito bom. A historria eh mt boa, porem eu achei o final um pouco menos climatico que o do primeiro. Ainda assim, um otimo jogo, recomendo muito.

First few minutes into the game and I can already understand why it is considered the best ever. 

The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.
This game is fun, I like helping resistance members because they need help. Watch out for irradiated water because it's irradiated and that hurts.
Fun little shooter from a little known company and franchise. Gotta support the small indies!
cara é um jogo incrivel, graficos ok, jogabilidade legal, historia EPICA, personagens marcantes, e  o gordon freeman ta melhor do que antes, e há mais partes que dão medo, e monstros epicos

A must for every gamer Half Life is a great step in gaming and has one of the best stories out there now dont forget that this game is old there are some things that aged but still I am still playing Half Life with Gmod I have to say but the story makes this game so good and most importantly its feels so good that I get erection everytime I play this

17 years later, still one of the best shooters ever.
